text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Mr.Trump I have a question the question is did the doctors find the medication to cure people that have Coronavirus cause I got an email that they found the medication to cure people from the Coronavirus by the way I’m staying home always washing my hand putting hand sanitizer
